page.title: 08The Convent
page.content: There were originally three houses at the site of the convent at Wroughton which is along the pitchens.These three houses were founded by the presentation sisters.The nuns who are living there now came in 1964 and are of the order of servants of the HOLY SPIRIT.At the present time there are twelve nuns living there,some of their constitutions (rules) are to love GOD and to love your neighbour.The nuns do a great deal of cummunity work and one sister visits the surrounding villages.They also hold group meetings at the convert for such people like the lydia ladies and the social service.One of the jobs of some of the nuns is to teach some of the visiting foreign nuns english.The nuns come from most parts of the world especially Europe and the far east.
